messages.content: What is the purpose of the DTAIImageToTextNode node in ComfyUI?
The DTAIImageToTextNode node is an optional add-on to the Comfy UI stable diffusion client that is designed to convert an image to text.
Which client does the DTAIImageToTextNode node need to be imported into?
The DTAIImageToTextNode node needs to be imported into the custom nodes directory of the Comfy UI client.
What improvements does the DTAIImageToTextNode node introduce in ComfyUI?
The DTAIImageToTextNode node introduces quality of life improvements by providing variable nodes and shared global variables in Comfy UI.
What is the license of the DTAIImageToTextNode node project?
The DTAIImageToTextNode node project is licensed under the MIT License.
What is the main dependency required for the DTAIImageToTextNode node?
The main dependency required for the DTAIImageToTextNode node is ComfyUI.
